Ok, I had done a search for linen shirts similar to others I had purchased.  I bought these shirts believing they were linen, but when I received them they were polyester.  I returned three shirts and expressed my disappointment to Amazon concerning the Coofandy brand.  However, after looking at the shirt specs, Coofandy did label them properly.  I’m not sure why these were included in a linen shirt search, so I’d caution anyone looking specifically for linen garments to be careful.  These weren’t bad shirts.  They just weren’t what I was looking for.

评论详情: I really like the look and feel of this shirt overall. It's lightweight and comfortable in warm weather. Like lots of clothing from China, they don't seem to get how to size items for larger people. At 6'1" and 225 lbs, size XL is snug in the arms and upper chest/back, but loose through the shoulders and torso. I'm somewhat muscular but nothing unusual. There's also a weird crease in the upper arm where it meets the shoulder seam, causing it to poof out a bit. However, these are little annoyances and won't keep me from wearing this shirt often.
